title: Blastproofing
desc:
Post 2093
- All cards in your hand are given the colors <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:yellow:1106234135384699023>.
- Deal 0 <:impact:1106704414225485894> to yourself and to the people neighboring you on the playerlist (including loops).
 - This factors in and gives <:impact:1106704414225485894> resistance.
